Package kotlin.template

Text processing API

See:
          Description

Traits Summary
Formatter Represents a formatter and encoder of values in a StringTemplate which understands
how to format values for a particular Locale such as with the LocaleFormatter or
to escape particular characters in different output formats such as [[HtmlFormatter]
 

Classes Summary
HtmlFormatter Formats values for HTML encoding, escaping special characters in HTML.
LocaleFormatter Formats values using a given Locale for internationalisation
ToStringFormatter Formats strings with no special encoding other than allowing the null text to be
configured
 

Property Summary
val
source
defaultLocale: Locale
           
 

Extensions Summary
kotlin.template.StringTemplate append toHtml toLocale toString
